content: Virgin Galactic is an American spaceflight company founded by Richard Branson and his British Virgin Group. It is headquartered in California, first flight 2021
Title: Virgin Galactic

content: SpaceX is an American aerospace manufacturer, space transportation services corporation headquartered in , California. SpaceX was founded in 2002 by Elon Musk
Title: SpaceX

content: Blue Origin, LLC is an American privately funded aerospace manufacturer and sub-orbital spaceflight services company headquartered in Kent, Washington.
Title: Blue Orgin
